channel.title: PKU on Jun-Liszt Li
channel.description: Recent content in PKU on Jun-Liszt Li

item.title: The Origin and function of brain oscillation
item.description: Since neurobiologist Hans Berger from German first reported spontaneous rhythmic variations in the human electroencephalogram [Berger 1929]. Many researchers become fascinated with this phenomenon and try to uncover its mystery. This rhythmic variations in brain is generally referred to brain oscillation.
